update_game_desc_1: You will need to update the game
restart_inputs_desc: This will restart all the inputs and the values entered. Your points will stay. Do you want to continue?
play_stop_online_desc: Create a room to invite up to 3 friends!
play_ttt_online_desc: Play with a friends and try to beat him!
invite_friends_desc: Invite your friends to play with you.
rate_game_desc: Let us know how much do you like this game for we can continue updating it.
vibration_desc: Turn off/on haptic vibration in the game.
sound_desc: Turn off/on haptic sound in the game.
github_desc: View the code of this incredible game and how it was made.
name: Name
close_room_desc: Are you sure you want to delete this room? It will kick out all the players!
close_room_join_desc: Are you sure you want to get out of this room?
error_game_not_found: No room found with this code.
verify_your_email_desc_1: We've sent you a verification link.
verify_your_email_desc_2: Please check your inbox or spam to continue.
verification_email_sent: Verify email sent to your inbox
error_login_username_min: Username must be at least 3 characters.
error_login_username_max: Username must be less than 10 characters.
error_login_email_used: This email is already in use. Please, sign in.
error_login_email_not_found: No user found with this email.
error_login_password_min: Password must be at least 6 characters.
error_login_many_attemps: Too many attempts. Try again later.

onboarding.text0: This game is very easy to play. Just follow the instructions and have fun.
onboarding.text1: Click any mode or join a game to play with friends.
onboarding.text2: Pick an avatar to represent you in the game.
onboarding.text3: Be the first to complete the boxes and review your teammates' answers.
